name: The Strange Laboratory
description:
The Strange Laboratory

"The Strange Laboratory" is a 2D-Plateformer made with Unreal Engine 4. Travel through trap-filled levels and fight zombies on your adventure.

Embark on the adventure "The Strange Laboratory" a 2D platform game made on Unreal Engine 4.

You are a robot who travels through a laboratory in order to face a giant zombie.

Unfortunately, the path is full of traps and surprises of all kinds ...

Can you beat those traps and kick the zombies out ?

Good luck !

Controls Gamepad
  • D-PAD : Move
  • Left stick : Move
  • Pause : Pause
  • A : Jump
  • B : Melee
  • Y : Shoot
Keyboard
  • Arrows : Move
  • Left/Right Shift : Shoot
  • Left/Right CTRL : Melee
  • Escape / P / Pause Break : Pause
Features 
  • 5 levels
  • Partial gamepad support on the menu
  • A short but nice adventure
  • Stamina system when you shoot and use the melee
  • Groovy soundtrack !
Know issues 

The tests I have done show that it is possible for level 4 and 5 to crash the game. If this happens, you can simply restart the game and get your adventure back in the "level selection" menu.

Level 4 crash appears when loading level 5 and level 5 when loading credits.

Note

I can't wait to hear your feedback and your thoughts on the game. This is my first video game and I can't wait to have some ways to improve!
